item.title: Problem 297 Serialize and Deserialize Binary Tree
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 297 Question Serialization is the process of converting a data structure or object into a sequence of bits so that it can be stored in a file or memory buffer, or transmitted across a network connection link to be reconstructed later in the same or another computer environment. Design an algorithm to serialize and deserialize a binary tree. There is no restriction on how your serialization/deserialization algorithm should work.
